summary: I WAS RIDING MY 2001 YAMAHA RAPTOR UP A HILL WHEN I GOT TO THE TOP, I HEARD A LOUD POP AND MY WHEELS LOCKED UP, AT FIRST I THOUGHT IT WAS THE CHAIN BUT THEN I WENT TO TAKE IT OUT OF GEAR AND IT WOULD NOT GO OUT OF GEAR, I TOOK THE SPROCKET OFF TO GET THE CHAIN OFF SO I COULD GET IT TOWED BACK TO MY VEHICLE. LUCKILY I WAS ON SAND, BECAUSE IF I WAS ON  HARD DIRT OR EVEN ASPHALT I COULD HAVE PROBABLY WENT OVER THE HANDLEBARS AND PROBABLY BROKEN SOMETHING.  I AM 6' 1" 230 LBS. I CAN NOT AFFORD TO BE OUT OF WORK FOR SOMETHING THAT YAMAHA KNOWS ABOUT BECAUSE THEY CHANGED THE TRANSMISSION FOR THE 2002 YAMAHA RAPTORS. I KNOW OF SEVERAL OTHER PEOPLE ALL WITH 2001 RAPTORS AND THEIR TRANSMISSION ALSO HAVE LOCKED UP ON THEM. I FEEL LIKE THAT YAMAHA SHOULD DO SOMETHING ABOUT IT BEFORE SOMEONE GETS KILLED OR SERIOUSLY INJURED IF SOMEONE HAS NOT ALREADY.   *JB
